scripts.build: npm run-script build:css && cp -r --verbose src/ dist/
scripts.postbuild: mogrify -strip -quality 90 -resize 1920 -density 72 -units pixelsperinch -interlace Plane dist/static/images/bg/*.jpg && mogrify -strip -quality 90 -resize 500x350^ -interlace Plane dist/static/images/team/*.jpg && mogrify -strip -quality 80 -resize 1024 -interlace Plane dist/static/images/projects/**/*/*.jpg dist/static/images/projects/**/*.jpg
